passages.text:
Characters:
------------
*Key Characters*
[[Cashier]] (required)
[[Free Samples Guy]] (required)
[[Grocery Store workers]] (helpful)
[[Police Officer]]

*Side Characters*
[[Elivs Impersonator]]
[[Deli Worker]]
[[Single Mom + Nosy Kid]]
[[Awkward College Kid]]
[[Lost Elderly Foreigner]]
[[Religious Fanatic]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
(The cashier scans your items)

Did you find everything okay?

[[I found you okay]]
[[No->did_not_find]]
[[Yes->found]]
[[I didn't steal anything!]]
passages.name: Cashier

passages.text:
Would you like to try a free sample?

[[I w-w-w-would love to! What?->Yes]]
[[Could you repeat that?->Free Samples Guy]]
[[I am very busy, no time for samples.]]
[[Yes]]

links.name: I am very busy, no time for samples.
links.link: I am very busy, no time for samples.

passages.name: Free Samples Guy

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Grocery Store workers

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Police Officer

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Elivs Impersonator

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Deli Worker

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Single Mom + Nosy Kid

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Awkward College Kid

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Lost Elderly Foreigner

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Religious Fanatic

passages.text:
So, how do you like it?

[[Yum. Good. Yes.->Good]]
[[It's delicious.->Good]]
[[Thanks. Bye.->end]]
[[Uhhhhhhh...->Good]]
passages.name: Yes

passages.text:
It will only take a second!

[[Okay ->Yes]]
[[Well... if it is only a second...->Yes]]
[[No thank you->end]]
[[Walk away->end]]

links.name: Well... if it is only a second...

passages.name: I am very busy, no time for samples.

passages.text:
You really like it? Well, you can buy more, right here, on this shelf that I am standing next to and watching. So I will see you if you don't take any.

[[I'll take one->end]]
[[Uhhhhh... bye->end]]
[[I will come back later->end]]
[[Gwaah! Wha? Na?]]
passages.name: Good

passages.text:
Want another sample?

[[Yes]]
[[No!!!->I am very busy, no time for samples.]]

links.name: No!!!
links.link: I am very busy, no time for samples.

passages.name: Gwaah! Wha? Na?

passages.text:
... are you flirting with me?
[[Yes->flirt]]
[[You misunderstand!]]
[[No->You misunderstand!]]
[[Why would I flirt with someone as ugly as you?->insult]]

links.name: Why would I flirt with someone as ugly as you?

passages.name: I found you okay

passages.text:
What are you looking for?

[[Nothing!->found]]
[[You, and I've been searching my whole life->I found you okay]]
[[Actually, I misspoke. I found everything->found]]
[[Potatoes]]

links.name: You, and I've been searching my whole life
Actually, I misspoke. I found everything

passages.name: did_not_find

passages.text:
Okay. Your total will be $8.95. Cash or credit?

[[Cash]]
[[Credit]]
[[I'm broke]]
[[Uh, uhh... uh.......->I'm broke]]
passages.name: found

passages.text:
I didn't ask if you stole anything.

[[Good! Because I didn't->found]]
[[But you stole... my heart->I found you okay]]
[[Oh.->found]]
[[I must have misheard->found]]
passages.name: I didn't steal anything!

passages.text:
You're... really bad at this.

[[Sorry, my specialty is The Sex->sex]]
[[I get nervous when I'm around a pretty person->sweet]]
[[Ah... um... are you going to bag my groceries?->found]]
[[It was just a joke->You misunderstand!]]

links.name: Sorry, my specialty is The Sex
I get nervous when I'm around a pretty person
Ah... um... are you going to bag my groceries?

passages.name: flirt

passages.text:
...okay. Are you ready to pay?
[[Actually I am flirting->flirt]]
[[Yes.->found]]
[[Want to go out with me?->flirt]]
[[You're fat->insult]]

links.name: Want to go out with me?

passages.name: You misunderstand!

passages.text:
... your total... will be $8.95. Would you like to pay with cash... or credit...

[[Cash]]
[[Credit]]
[[Sorry! I did not mean that, you know?->panic]]
[[That was called negging. Pretty good huh?->panic]]

links.name: Sorry! I did not mean that, you know?
That was called negging. Pretty good huh?

passages.name: insult

passages.text:
Not interested. Did. You. Find. Everything. Okay.

[[You might not be interested now, but I am, and I will keep coming back until you are->throw]]
[[No->did_not_find]]
[[Yes->found]]
[[I didn't steal anything!]]

links.name: You might not be interested now, but I am, and I will keep coming back until you are

passages.name: sex

passages.text:
Awww. You're adorable. I'm not really interested in you. Are you ready to pay?

[[No->did_not_find]]
[[Yes->found]]
[[I didn't steal anything!]]
passages.name: sweet

passages.text:
(You dig through your wallet, but you only have a hundred dollar bill and a couple of pennies)

[[Pay with the hundred]]
[[On second thought, I will use my card->Credit]]
[[Uh I uh only have a hundred, um I hope that's okay->panic]]
[[Oh no! What do I do? Did I say that out loud? Am I saying this out loud?->panic]]

links.name: On second thought, I will use my card
Uh I uh only have a hundred, um I hope that's okay
Oh no! What do I do? Did I say that out loud? Am I saying this out loud?

passages.name: Cash

passages.text:
(You swipe your card through the card-reader. The interface "error".) Oh, that's a debit card, not a credit card. You will have to insert it into the slot and enter the pin number.

[[But I always use it as a credit card->always]]
[[Okay->Debit]]
[[On second thought, I'll pay with cash->Cash]]
[[*throw your wallet at her*->throw]]

links.name: But I always use it as a credit card
On second thought, I'll pay with cash

passages.name: Credit

passages.text:
Potatoes are in the vegatable isle.

[[*Leave to go get a potato*->end]]
[[I changed my mind, I am ready to check out->found]]

links.name: I changed my mind, I am ready to check out

passages.name: Potatoes

passages.text:
I'm not giving any handouts here. Are you going to pay?

[[Cash]]
[[Credit]]
[[*Make a break for it*->end]]
[[Maybe I can offer you... something else->I found you okay]]

links.name: Maybe I can offer you... something else

passages.name: I'm broke

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: end

passages.text:
(She takes the bill from you and looks at you strangely)

[[Sorry! It is all I have->sorry]]
[[*Wait for her to make change*]]
[[Oh god you hate me now, I'm so sorry->sorry]]
[[Wait! I want to pay with credit->Credit]]

links.name: Sorry! It is all I have
Oh god you hate me now, I'm so sorry
Wait! I want to pay with credit

passages.name: Pay with the hundred

passages.text:
Excuse me, there are other people in line, and my manager is giving me that look that says I'm supposed to get you to hurry. Can you plase pay?

[[Pay with the hundred]]
[[On second thought, I will use my card->Credit]]
[[I can't pay->I'm broke]]
[[*Throw the wallet at her*->throw]]

links.name: On second thought, I will use my card

passages.name: panic

passages.text:
That's it, I'm calling security.

[[*Wait for security*]] // hook this up later
[[*make a break for it*->end]]
passages.name: throw

passages.text: TODO
passages.name: *Wait for security*

passages.text:
It is alright. Let me see that. (She rubs a conterfeit marker over the bill and then places it in the register. She hands you back four twenties, a ten, a one, and a nickel. She also hands you your reciept, and a single bag with your three items.)

[[Thank you!->end]]
[[Excuse me, you shortchanged me.->change]]
[[That is not enough->change]]
[[Keep the change!]]
passages.name: sorry

passages.text:
(She rubs a conterfeit marker over the bill and then places it in the register. She hands you back four twenties, a ten, and a nickel. She also hands you your reciept, and a single bag with your three items.)

[[Thank you!->end]]
[[Excuse me, you shortchanged me.->change]]
[[That is not enough->change]]
[[Keep the change!]]
passages.name: *Wait for her to make change*

passages.text:
No I didn't. I gave you back ninety-one-oh-five.

[[*Look through the bills again*]]
[[No, you gave me back ninety and a nickel. I still need a dollar->insist]]
[[But... I am the customer... you have no right...->insist]]
[[Count them again->insist]]

links.name: No, you gave me back ninety and a nickel. I still need a dollar
But... I am the customer... you have no right...

passages.name: change

passages.text:
I'm not allowed to take tips. 

[[Oh, right, sorry, um, I'll go now->ignored]]
[[But you shortchanged me...->change]]

links.name: Oh, right, sorry, um, I'll go now

passages.name: Keep the change!

passages.text:
(You find the one stuck to the back of the ten that she gave you)

[[Ah, it is here. My mistake. Have a good day.->end]]
[[*pretend* You should count them again->insist]]
[[Oh no I'm so sorry I'm sorry I'm so sorry->ignored]]
[[*run away*->end]]

links.name: Ah, it is here. My mistake. Have a good day.
Oh no I'm so sorry I'm sorry I'm so sorry

passages.name: *Look through the bills again*

passages.text:
(She looks through the stack of bills that you hand back to her) Sorry about that, I was sure I gave it to you. Here. (She opens the register again and takes out a one dollar bill)

[[Thank you.->end]]
[[Ugh, finally!->ignored]]
[[I always get my way in the end!->ignored]]
[[*walk away*->end]]

links.name: I always get my way in the end!

passages.name: insist

passages.text:
Have a nice day. (She turns to the next customer and begins bagging his groceries)

[[*walk away*->end]]
[[*slink away*->end]]
[[*get back in line*->back in line]]
passages.name: ignored

passages.text:
You again! That's it I'm calling security.

[[*Wait for security*]] // hook this up later
[[*make a break for it*->end]]
passages.name: back in line

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: always

passages.text:
(She waits impatiently while you fumble with the pin code)

[[I uh... forgot my pin number->pin]]
[[Four... six... three... eight... who do we appreciate?->pin]]
[[What is it again?->pin]]
[[Maybe I'll just pay with cash->Cash]]

links.name: I uh... forgot my pin number
Four... six... three... eight... who do we appreciate?
Maybe I'll just pay with cash

passages.name: Debit

passages.text:
You're holding up the line. Please pay.

[[Almost got it...]]
[[I'll just use cash->Cash]]
[[*throw the card at her*->throw]]
passages.name: pin

passages.text:
(You successfully remember your pin number. The payment goes through.) Thank you for shopping at SuperMart. Have a nice day.

[[You too.->end]]
[[*walk away*->end]]
[[potato!->Potatoes]]
[[Bye.->end]]
passages.name: Almost got it...
